snippet: At least six Ukrainian soldiers have been killed in more than two days of fighting as separatists intensified shelling of government positions ahead of peace talks expected in the coming week, Ukrainian military officials said Friday.
lead_paragraph: At least six Ukrainian soldiers have been killed in more than two days of fighting as separatists intensified shelling of government positions ahead of peace talks expected in the coming week, Ukrainian military officials said Friday.

headline.main: Ukraine: Separatists Intensify Attacks on Army Posts
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Separatists Intensify Attacks on Army Posts
